https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5xyTqwZHtKOf7f8KYhW97kijFpy.jpg Wild and unpredictable events shake up the life of Aaron, who, before being stung by a scorpion and kidnapped, was a simple wage slave. Now, he's immersed in a strange adventure that will find him seduced by a coworker and assaulted by a gang of elderly women… and that's just the start of his trials and tribulations! Aaron… Albeit a Sex Hero
